message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. I'm interested in purchasing the product, but I can only pay $100.
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $105.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. I would like to counter with an offer of $102 for the product.
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer it to you for $108.
I appreciate your efforts to reach a fair price, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $106 for the product.
I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $109, but that's as low as I can go.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $107 for the product.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $110, Bob. That's the absolute minimum I can do. If you're still interested, I'm willing to make a deal at that price.
Considering our previous discussions, I believe $108 is a fair price for the product. I hope you can agree, Alice.
